LABEL: 0x2A2
STRING: We were on our way back to the crew room, with me being pushed around by Reiri from start to finish.

LABEL: 0x384
STRING: As we descended the stairs to the second floor, a shadow approached us from the other side of the staircase.

LABEL: 0x3FA
STRING: 「Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x482
STRING: 「Oh, If it isn't Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x4B1
STRING: I thought it would be safe to lock her inside the lab, but I guess she came out on her own.

LABEL: 0x507
STRING: It looked like she was about to return to the crew rooms as well, so the timing was perfect.

LABEL: 0x567
STRING: I had thought she would spend the whole day chatting with her jellyfish.

LABEL: 0x5BF
STRING: She was done faster than I expected.

LABEL: 0x5E3
STRING: 「Are you done with the lantern jellyfish?」

LABEL: 0x681
STRING: 「Yes. Turns out humans are more interesting than jellyfish, after all.」

LABEL: 0x71C
STRING: 「By the way, who's that young lady over there?」

LABEL: 0x769
STRING: She pointed her index finger at Reiri as she made her inquiry.

LABEL: 0x7AB
STRING: She was like a great detective naming the culprit―or just plain rude.

LABEL: 0x7F5
STRING: Don't point at people you've never met before.

LABEL: 0x827
STRING: 「This girl is Reiri. She's Touri's sister.」

LABEL: 0x920
STRING: 「Oh, Akari-chan's sister. I remember her. She was asleep until now.」

LABEL: 0x970
STRING: 「I'm a beautiful girl. It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.」

LABEL: 0xA35
STRING: Reiri was showered with a full burst of Tokiwa's energy right after recovering.

LABEL: 0xA8B
STRING: Tokiwa tilted her head slightly at Reiri, who didn't seem particularly confused, but who didn't react either.

LABEL: 0xB4B
STRING: 「Oh, are you deaf? Must be hard at your age.」

LABEL: 0xBE6
STRING: 「It would be a good idea to have Sousuke-san examine that.」

LABEL: 0xCA4
STRING: 「Unfortunately, my body has already been thoroughly violated by that doctor.」

LABEL: 0xDAF
STRING: 「Say what?! And he wouldn't even lay a single finger on me!」

LABEL: 0xDFC
STRING: 「I guess he must feel like I'm out of his league.」

LABEL: 0xE4E
STRING: 「I keep telling him that there's no need to hold back and that he's more than『welcome.』」

LABEL: 0xF07
STRING: 「You have to give a good-natured man like that a proper excuse, first and foremost.」

LABEL: 0xFB6
STRING: 「It'll be easy to trap him if you just say that it's too hard to breathe with your sash so tight.」

LABEL: 0x1007
STRING: 「May I call you God?」

LABEL: 0x10A1
STRING: 「Do whatever you want.」

LABEL: 0x10C2
STRING: What the hell were they talking about...?

LABEL: 0x10EE
STRING: The two of them probably weren't on the same wavelength at all, but they were having a conversation... That was unusual.

LABEL: 0x1177
STRING: Tokiwa didn't seem like she was particularly bad at dealing with people, but to think that Reiri would lend an ear to her...

LABEL: 0x11CF
STRING: Even Touri was largely ignored by Reiri... I kind of felt even more sorry for her now.

LABEL: 0x1227
STRING: Before I knew it, they had moved on to comparing their hand sizes.

LABEL: 0x1270
STRING: Tokiwa let out a『YES!!』with nice pronunciation.

LABEL: 0x12A3
STRING: When I looked, it seemed like her fingers were almost one joint longer than Reiri's.

LABEL: 0x12E5
STRING: ...This was stupid.

LABEL: 0x1303
STRING: 「Haah...」

LABEL: 0x1339
STRING: Forgetting the fact that we were trapped inside the <SHEEP III>, I felt exasperated.

LABEL: 0x1388
STRING: I held my head in my hands, and Tokiwa clapped her hands together as if remembering my existence.

LABEL: 0x144C
STRING: 「Ha!」

LABEL: 0x14C1
STRING: 「Yes, yes, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x14E5
STRING: 「Come to think of it, I've learned something strange.」

LABEL: 0x152E
STRING: Tokiwa switched back to speaking sublime Japanese.

LABEL: 0x156A
STRING: You realize that you're pretty strange yourself, right?

LABEL: 0x1598
STRING: I'd like to say something sarcastic, but...

LABEL: 0x15CA
STRING: Not only did she not seem to catch on to sarcasm,

LABEL: 0x1604
STRING: I was afraid that the conversation would take a turn in a weird direction if I did.

LABEL: 0x165A
STRING: I didn't have the courage to take that risk.

LABEL: 0x1684
STRING: 「Strange? You mean the jellyfish?」

LABEL: 0x16B8
STRING: 「Have you made another discovery that will go down in the history of biology?」

LABEL: 0x16F6
STRING: I was half-serious, half-joking.

LABEL: 0x1724
STRING: The fact that it wasn't a complete joke was both the great and the troublesome thing about Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x1833
STRING: She, however, shook her head vigorously.

LABEL: 0x18FE
STRING: 「Nguh!」

LABEL: 0x191B
STRING: Reiri covered her face with her hands as she was attacked by Tokiwa's swaying long hair due to her headbanging.

LABEL: 0x1975
STRING: As for Tokiwa, she shook her head around for a while, then breathed heavily.

LABEL: 0x1A39
STRING: 「Haah, haah...」

LABEL: 0x1A5E
STRING: 「...Are you all right?」

LABEL: 0x1AEA
STRING: 「...H-Hearing what you said earlier, I... began to wonder... Nngh...」

LABEL: 0x1B4C
STRING: 「I-In the first place... this accident... Haah...」

LABEL: 0x1B93
STRING: 「Deep breaths.」

LABEL: 0x1C19
STRING: 「...Was methane hydrate really the cause of this accident to begin with?」

LABEL: 0x1C7A
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0x1CBE
STRING: Tokiwa nodded busily as she flailed her arms around and took deep breaths.

LABEL: 0x1D17
STRING: 「Yukari-san said that the cause of this accident was a methane hydrate explosion.」

LABEL: 0x1D69
STRING: 「At that moment, I thought...」

LABEL: 0x1D95
STRING: 「Is there really that much methane hydrate buried in the waters around here?」

LABEL: 0x1E88
STRING: 「If you're asking me why I thought that, it's because I did some research on this area a long time ago.」

LABEL: 0x1EE4
STRING: 「If you're asking me why I didn't tell you, it's because I read the mood.」

LABEL: 0x1F87
STRING: 「It was probably the first『Air Reading』of my life. It was over in the blink of an eye.」

LABEL: 0x1FE3
STRING: Tokiwa covered both her cheeks as she said that.

LABEL: 0x2011
STRING: It was hard to react to this tricky idiot...

LABEL: 0x203B
STRING: Not sure if she was playing dumb or not, Tokiwa straightened up as if nothing had happened.

LABEL: 0x210B
STRING: 「Well, let's say that there were reserves of methane hydrate in this area.」

LABEL: 0x2155
STRING: 「If we do,

LABEL: 0x2179
STRING: I actually have this data here...」

LABEL: 0x21CA
STRING: Tokiwa reached into the pocket of her kimono.

LABEL: 0x2204
STRING: I was already used to the sight of her rummaging around her chest.

LABEL: 0x2238
STRING: I was used to it... but I didn't want to stare. I averted my eyes.

LABEL: 0x2290
STRING: As I did, my eyes found Reiri.

LABEL: 0x2324
STRING: 「What is it? You're grinning.」

LABEL: 0x235D
STRING: 「I'm not!」

LABEL: 0x23E7
STRING: 「You didn't realize it, huh? That's even worse.」

LABEL: 0x2432
STRING: It was no use... The more I struggled, the deeper I dug myself into a hole.

LABEL: 0x2490
STRING: Should I feel respect toward Reiri's ability to have a comeback for everything?

LABEL: 0x255A
STRING: 「Hmmm, it's stuck...」

LABEL: 0x25FB
STRING: 「...I'm gonna have to take it off.」

LABEL: 0x261E
STRING: 「Stop it!」

LABEL: 0x26A8
STRING: 「Ah, there. Here it is.」

LABEL: 0x26D1
STRING: What Tokiwa took out of her kimono was a familiar-looking PDA.

LABEL: 0x2710
STRING: ...Actually, I had just seen one a moment ago.

LABEL: 0x273E
STRING: 「Return that already... If they find out you stole it, they'll get mad at you.」

LABEL: 0x2797
STRING: 「No, no. It's nothing as disreputable as that.」

LABEL: 0x27BF
STRING: 「This is called mooching.」

LABEL: 0x27EC
STRING: 「That's the same as stealing!」

LABEL: 0x2823
STRING: 「Now, now. If you keep yelling like that, it'll be bad for your throat.」

LABEL: 0x2863
STRING: 「Sucking on a troche might help.」

LABEL: 0x2898
STRING: And whose fault was that...?

LABEL: 0x28B4
STRING: She grabbed the PDA with both of her hands, then pressed it against my face.

LABEL: 0x2969
STRING: 「...It's dazzling.」

LABEL: 0x2994
STRING: 「That's just your imagination. It's electronic paper, so it shouldn't be too bright.」

LABEL: 0x29EB
STRING: 「I can't see anything...」

LABEL: 0x2A22
STRING: 「Ah, you're too close.」

LABEL: 0x2A53
STRING: 「Give me that.」

LABEL: 0x2ACC
STRING: I took the PDA from her and looked at the display.

LABEL: 0x2B07
STRING: Displayed there was a three-dimensional model that looked like two spheres lined up.

LABEL: 0x2B51
STRING: Numerical data was tied to each part of it.

LABEL: 0x2B85
STRING: 「...Is this information about the <SHEEP III>?」

LABEL: 0x2C43
STRING: A silent confirmation.

LABEL: 0x2C5D
STRING: But still, was this kind of information something that anyone could look into from the library?

LABEL: 0x2CAB
STRING: No, that couldn't be it.

LABEL: 0x2CCF
STRING: If such information were leaked to someone with malicious intent, it would quickly become a target of terrorism.

LABEL: 0x2D21
STRING: In all likelihood, this was beyond the viewing privileges of the average passenger.

LABEL: 0x2DC9
STRING: 「I was able to look at a lot of data yesterday, thanks to Yukari-san's authority.」

LABEL: 0x2E10
STRING: Yesterday... That was when we were looking into the pressure resistance of the diving suit.

LABEL: 0x2E59
STRING: 「While I was calculating, the PC seemed to be free, so...」

LABEL: 0x2E95
STRING: 「I extracted some interesting-looking data.」

LABEL: 0x2ED0
STRING: 「Seriously...?」

LABEL: 0x2EFB
STRING: 「Don't worry. This PDA is independent of the ship's network.」

LABEL: 0x2F48
STRING: 「It won't leak out.」

LABEL: 0x2F6F
STRING: Tokiwa waved her hand with a smile.

LABEL: 0x2F97
STRING: She spoke casually, but there was something off with what she said.

LABEL: 0x2FE9
STRING: I couldn't believe she had gone through the trouble of rewriting the settings of a PDA, whose functions were restricted for use on board.

LABEL: 0x304E
STRING: The fact that she said it nonchalantly like that... Her true power scared me.

LABEL: 0x30A2
STRING: Reiri had a slight smile on her face but remained as a silent listener to Tokiwa's story.

LABEL: 0x315A
STRING: 「Now then, let's start with the conclusion. Considering the impact resistance of this ship...」

LABEL: 0x31A4
STRING: 「...A collapse of methane hydrate isn't enough to make a hole in the hull.」

LABEL: 0x3201
STRING: Tokiwa stated the facts as she saw them without hesitating.

LABEL: 0x323D
STRING: Her tone left no room for speculation.

LABEL: 0x326D
STRING: However, what she presented to us was a direct contradiction to what Yukari had told us.

LABEL: 0x32C5
STRING: 「Are you saying that Yukari-san lied to us?」

LABEL: 0x3310
STRING: 「No. I might be right, and she might have made a mistake.」

LABEL: 0x33E5
STRING: 「I'm used to people saying things like "You need proof, not just numbers" and so on,

LABEL: 0x343B
STRING: so I took my next course of action.」

LABEL: 0x3464
STRING: Tokiwa clasped her hands together in front of her chest as she continued.

LABEL: 0x349C
STRING: Reiri leaned against the railing of the stairs, apparently tired of the long conversation.

LABEL: 0x34EB
STRING: 「If there was enough methane hydrate to cause that much of an impact,

LABEL: 0x353F
STRING: there should still be traces of the explosion in the seawater...」

LABEL: 0x3597
STRING: 「In order to confirm that, I collected some seawater earlier and――」

LABEL: 0x35EC
STRING: 「Seawater?!」

LABEL: 0x3606
STRING: 「What about the red lantern jellyfish?」

LABEL: 0x369C
STRING: 「That was a bonus. It was about as cute as me.」

LABEL: 0x36FD
STRING: Tokiwa didn't seem the least bit ashamed.

LABEL: 0x372F
STRING: I see... I had been taken advantage of by Tokiwa...

LABEL: 0x3775
STRING: And considering that I was just led around by Reiri as well... What was it, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x37B9
STRING: Maybe I was at fault for being easily pushed around?

LABEL: 0x3801
STRING: No, definitely not.

LABEL: 0x3899
STRING: 「And, well, let me give you my conclusion.」

LABEL: 0x38CF
STRING: 「As I thought, there were no traces of methane levels above average in the seawater.」

LABEL: 0x391D
STRING: 「It wasn't methane hydrate... Just as I was thinking that, I suddenly noticed something.」

LABEL: 0x3981
STRING: 「Aka-chan was incredibly weak.」

LABEL: 0x39BA
STRING: 「Aka-chan?」

LABEL: 0x39E7
STRING: 「You're talking about that red lantern jellyfish, I gather?」

LABEL: 0x3A8D
STRING: 「Exactly. As expected of Reiri-chan.」

LABEL: 0x3AC2
STRING: Oh, shut up...

LABEL: 0x3ADE
STRING: Actually, why did the two of them understand each other so well all of a sudden...?

LABEL: 0x3B36
STRING: 「If Aka-chan's weakened, then there must be something wrong with the seawater.」

LABEL: 0x3B8E
STRING: 「If it wasn't methane, then... I tried various reagents.」

LABEL: 0x3BEA
STRING: 「And, there was one thing that produced a reaction.」

LABEL: 0x3C2F
STRING: 「Which was?」

LABEL: 0x3C58
STRING: 「Potassium iodide starch paper.」

LABEL: 0x3C87
STRING: 「Potassium iodide starch...?」

LABEL: 0x3CB5
STRING: I could only repeat the words like an idiot.

LABEL: 0x3CE9
STRING: The situation must have felt funny to Reiri because I heard a coughing laugh next to me.

LABEL: 0x3E0E
STRING: 「Ha ha...」

LABEL: 0x3E2C
STRING: 「You're pretty ignorant, Katagiri.」

LABEL: 0x3E59
STRING: 「...Are you making fun of me?」

LABEL: 0x3EF1
STRING: 「Is that even a question? There's no room for doubt.」

LABEL: 0x3F88
STRING: 「I am making fun of you.」

LABEL: 0x3FB7
STRING: You don't have to be so upfront about it...

LABEL: 0x3FED
STRING: Up until now, she had been somewhat roundabout and witty,

LABEL: 0x403F
STRING: but when she said it so bluntly, there was nothing I could say back to her.

LABEL: 0x408F
STRING: As I fell silent, Reiri looked at me in satisfaction and began to talk slowly.

LABEL: 0x414B
STRING: 「Potassium iodide starch paper is a reagent that's sensitive to oxidants.」

LABEL: 0x4195
STRING: 「Examples of oxidants are things like hydrogen peroxide water, chlorine...」

LABEL: 0x41DD
STRING: 「――And ozone.」

LABEL: 0x4210
STRING: 「In other words, there was an abnormally large oxidant concentration in the seawater in this area...」

LABEL: 0x4279
STRING: 「That's what it seems like.」

LABEL: 0x42A2
STRING: Tokiwa nodded in agreement to Reiri's words.

LABEL: 0x42CC
STRING: However, she immediately turned her head and let out a curious voice.

LABEL: 0x4376
STRING: 「But why would something like that be here...?」

LABEL: 0x43B4
STRING: 「I know it doesn't make sense unless we know that, but I have no idea why.」

LABEL: 0x447A
STRING: 「I completely agree.」

LABEL: 0x449A
STRING: 「This is as far as we can tell with the information we have...」

LABEL: 0x452D
STRING: 「All that's left is to gang up on that attendant.」

LABEL: 0x456E
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x458A
STRING: If these two were in agreement, it didn't seem like I could overturn it, no matter what I said.

LABEL: 0x45D7
STRING: Still, even if we asked Yukari, would she answer?

LABEL: 0x461F
STRING: If it was a deliberate lie she had told that the methane hydrate explosion had sunk the ship――

LABEL: 0x4681
STRING: If it was a lie, then what was her intent...?

LABEL: 0x46B1
STRING: There was no way that Yukari would try to hinder us.

LABEL: 0x46E9
STRING: Was there any point in exposing a lie that she'd told out of concern or in order to protect something...?

LABEL: 0x4741
STRING: 「...It's almost time.」

LABEL: 0x4767
STRING: 「Let's go meet up with everyone.」

LABEL: 0x4A8B
STRING: After returning to the crew room and meeting up with Touri and Hiragino,

LABEL: 0x4AC1
STRING: the five of us headed straight for the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x4B0F
STRING: 「They're getting along pretty well...」

LABEL: 0x4B46
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x4C70
STRING: Ahead of us were Tokiwa, Touri, and Reiri.

LABEL: 0x4CA0
STRING: Hiragino and I were following behind them.

LABEL: 0x4CD0
STRING: The Nomura sisters were flanking Tokiwa on both sides while they all conversed with each other.

LABEL: 0x4D97
STRING: Touri smiled brightly at whatever they were saying.

LABEL: 0x4DBF
STRING: It was as if she no longer remembered being rejected by Reiri when they parted ways earlier.

LABEL: 0x4E28
STRING: 「They're all weird kids, so maybe it balances out.」

LABEL: 0x4E77
STRING: 「No comment.」

LABEL: 0x4E97
STRING: The phrase I'd picked up from Reiri was more useful than I thought.

LABEL: 0x4ED9
STRING: They were all weird, huh?

LABEL: 0x4EFA
STRING: I felt a little bad lumping Touri together with them... but I couldn't really deny it.

LABEL: 0x4F87
STRING: And then, just as we were approaching the stairs, Reiri stopped.

LABEL: 0x5033
STRING: 「Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x5050
STRING: Touri looked back at her with concern.

LABEL: 0x5076
STRING: Reiri held up the palm of her hand to stop her as she was about to run up to her.

LABEL: 0x512E
STRING: 「Sorry. You go on ahead.」

LABEL: 0x5174
STRING: 「I'm a little tired...」

LABEL: 0x51A3
STRING: 「Reiri!」

LABEL: 0x51C0
STRING: Reiri then lost her balance, as if blown away by the wind.

LABEL: 0x51F8
STRING: Touri reached out to her, but she was too late.

LABEL: 0x5222
STRING: She collapsed, just like that――

LABEL: 0x52B1
STRING: 「――Whoa!」

LABEL: 0x52CB
STRING: I caught her just in time.

LABEL: 0x52EF
STRING: Her thin body pressed against mine.

LABEL: 0x530F
STRING: Reiri's hand crawled across my body through my clothes, as if clinging to something.

LABEL: 0x5353
STRING: I held her with both of my arms and supported her.

LABEL: 0x5395
STRING: 「Are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x53C0
STRING: 「You're overreacting...」

LABEL: 0x53E3
STRING: She said that, but there was no strength in her voice.

LABEL: 0x5413
STRING: Beads of sweat were forming on her forehead.

LABEL: 0x54CE
STRING: Touri looked worried.

LABEL: 0x54EC
STRING: Tokiwa and Hiragino were concerned about her too, but I could see a hint of grim resolve on Touri's face.

LABEL: 0x5602
STRING: 「Reiri, are you sure you're okay?」

LABEL: 0x5639
STRING: 「Yeah... I just need a little rest...」

LABEL: 0x5666
STRING: 「Let me see...」

LABEL: 0x568A
STRING: I wiped the sweat off her face and touched her forehead.

LABEL: 0x56AE
STRING: Her body temperature didn't seem to be rising.

LABEL: 0x56DA
STRING: Her breathing was also normal.

LABEL: 0x56FE
STRING: In terms of symptoms...

LABEL: 0x572B
STRING: 「Anemia, is it...? You did force yourself to walk around...」

LABEL: 0x5766
STRING: Hiragino held his forehead as if to say, "I told you so."

LABEL: 0x57DE
STRING: But if that was the case, it would make things easier.

LABEL: 0x587A
STRING: 「?! Hey! Stop it, you idiot!」

LABEL: 0x58AB
STRING: 「Just be quiet for a moment.」

LABEL: 0x58ED
STRING: I easily lifted up Reiri's light body.

LABEL: 0x5929
STRING: Carrying her on my back, I urged everyone to continue toward the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x59D9
STRING: 「I said stop! You idiot!」

LABEL: 0x5A0B
STRING: 「Asshole! Dumbass! Don't do whatever you want with people's bodies!」

LABEL: 0x5A52
STRING: 「Shut up. Don't struggle. I'll lose my balance.」

LABEL: 0x5B06
STRING: 「Hey! Don't touch any weird places with an excuse like that!」

LABEL: 0x5B51
STRING: 「Don't misunderstand. I've no choice but to hold you tightly since you're struggling so much.」

LABEL: 0x5B9F
STRING: 「You'll be fine as long as you behave.」

LABEL: 0x5C59
STRING: 「Why do I have to be humiliated like this in the first place?!」

LABEL: 0x5CA0
STRING: 「See, you're so high up!」

LABEL: 0x5CEF
STRING: 「I'll remember this...」

LABEL: 0x5D16
STRING: A grudge-like voice whispered in my ear.

LABEL: 0x5D40
STRING: The symptoms of her anemia disappeared the moment I put her on my back. She was now full of energy.

LABEL: 0x5DB8
STRING: The blows to the back of my head and the verbal abuse continued until we reached the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x60A5
STRING: Yukari, who had been in deep sleep earlier, had woken up and was thinking about something.

LABEL: 0x6163
STRING: 「Oh. Reiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x6185
STRING: 「You're awake.」

LABEL: 0x61A9
STRING: 「Nice to meet you, I'm――」

LABEL: 0x629E
STRING: 「I'm tired of hearing introductions. Besides, I heard your name yesterday.」

LABEL: 0x6354
STRING: 「What――」

LABEL: 0x6377
STRING: Yukari's eyes widened at Reiri's rough way of speaking.

LABEL: 0x63AB
STRING: But... come to think of it, it was yesterday, wasn't it?

LABEL: 0x6467
STRING: The time when we had gathered in the observation deck where Yukari and POL had told us about the deep sea seemed like a distant memory now.

LABEL: 0x656A
STRING: Thinking back, almost everyone was there at that moment, including the six of us here.

LABEL: 0x65CB
STRING: The events in the observation deck, each and every encounter, grazed my mind.

LABEL: 0x6681
STRING: ...I wondered what had happened to that girl.

LABEL: 0x66B3
STRING: That small, pale girl who had called herself a poet.

LABEL: 0x66E9
STRING: Hikari――

LABEL: 0x66FF
STRING: She'd said that Touri was her older sister, but from Touri's point of view, that didn't seem to be the case.

LABEL: 0x6757
STRING: Touri had claimed that Reiri was her only sister.

LABEL: 0x6789
STRING: What on earth did that mean?

LABEL: 0x6835
STRING: Come to think of it, I hadn't told Reiri about Hikari after she woke up.

LABEL: 0x6879
STRING: I didn't know if she'd know anything about her, but I guess I would ask Reiri about it later.

LABEL: 0x695F
STRING: 「The communication functions will be restored in a moment.」

LABEL: 0x6993
STRING: 「We can contact the surface then.」

LABEL: 0x69C1
STRING: 「We'll be able to inform the search party that we're here.」

LABEL: 0x6A93
STRING: 「Preparation is key to that.」

LABEL: 0x6ABD
STRING: 「We don't want any trifling equipment problems, or anything like that.」

LABEL: 0x6B00
STRING: She checked whether the various power supplies were working properly as she said it.

LABEL: 0x6B4C
STRING: She adjusted the connectors one by one and checked the status of the panels.

LABEL: 0x6B9D
STRING: 「Now all we have to do is press this――」

LABEL: 0x6BCC
STRING: Yukari's finger slid across the control panel.

LABEL: 0x6C00
STRING: A communication standby screen was then displayed, indicating that the blue-tinged interface was in a normal state.

LABEL: 0x6CCC
STRING: 「Well... there should still be some time left.」

LABEL: 0x6D02
STRING: 「Let's wait until we can make contact.」

LABEL: 0x6D3B
STRING: She sat down.

LABEL: 0x6D75
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x6DEB
STRING: A short burst of static leaked out of the speaker.

LABEL: 0x6E1F
STRING: 「What―?!」

LABEL: 0x6EA7
STRING: 「Shh! Quiet!」

LABEL: 0x6F5E
STRING: 「Adjust the reception!」

LABEL: 0x6F89
STRING: Obeying Yukari's command, I twisted my wrist on the controller to optimize the sensor.

LABEL: 0x6FF7
STRING: The next moment...

LABEL: 0x700F
STRING: 『This is the exploration vessel <Yuunagi>, over.』

LABEL: 0x705B
STRING: ――Were we connected?

LABEL: 0x7077
STRING: I gasped involuntarily and looked at the clock.

LABEL: 0x70A1
STRING: That was strange. It wasn't even 12:00 yet.

LABEL: 0x70D3
STRING: It was the same when I looked at the gauges in the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x70FD
STRING: So why――?

LABEL: 0x7117
STRING: The reason we couldn't communicate with them was because I had physically restricted the function until 12:00.

LABEL: 0x716F
STRING: It was impossible for the timer to be done earlier than it was set.

LABEL: 0x71D1
STRING: It should be impossible...

LABEL: 0x71F7
STRING: ...Did I miscalculate something?

LABEL: 0x72F2
STRING: 「Are we connected?

LABEL: 0x73BC
STRING: Yes!!」

LABEL: 0x743F
STRING: 「『Ohh yeahh?!』」

LABEL: 0x7469
STRING: Touri was excited and asked for a high-five.

LABEL: 0x749D
STRING: Tokiwa responded with equal enthusiasm.

LABEL: 0x74C3
STRING: They were just two innocent girls who knew nothing.

LABEL: 0x752F
STRING: Speaking of girls, there was one more――

LABEL: 0x7557
STRING: I looked around.

LABEL: 0x757F
STRING: Reiri, who had complained about anemia, was leaning against the wall by herself.

LABEL: 0x7648
STRING: She bit her lower lip and clicked her tongue.

LABEL: 0x766C
STRING: Reiri glared at the display with a somewhat bitter and vexed look on her face.

LABEL: 0x76AC
STRING: But why...?

LABEL: 0x76CC
STRING: Surely she wanted to escape too.

LABEL: 0x7700
STRING: Why was she wearing that expression...? Was she not feeling well?

LABEL: 0x776D
STRING: 「Quiet down, everyone!」

LABEL: 0x7794
STRING: Yukari's voice echoed through the noisy wheelhouse, which was mostly due to Tokiwa and Touri.

LABEL: 0x77DA
STRING: After a moment of silence, Yukari cleared her throat and headed for the microphone.

LABEL: 0x7894
STRING: 「This is <SHEEP III>――」

LABEL: 0x78C0
STRING: 『This is <Yuunagi>. What's your current situation? Over.』

LABEL: 0x7911
STRING: 「This is <SHEEP III>. The second and third floors on the rear section are submerged.」

LABEL: 0x794A
STRING: 「No abnormalities in the front section. No problems around the hatch. Six confirmed survivors. Over.」

LABEL: 0x79A4
STRING: I could hear a voice through the speakers.

LABEL: 0x79CE
STRING: It was definitely coming from the surface.

LABEL: 0x79FC
STRING: Our exchange with the <Yuunagi> was going smoothly, without any problems or discrepancies.

LABEL: 0x7A52
STRING: If it kept going like this, we'd definitely be rescued――

LABEL: 0x7AA6
STRING: 『This is <Yuunagi>. Next, give us a report on your current coordinates――』

LABEL: 0x7B55
STRING: It was at that moment.

LABEL: 0x7B73
STRING: There was terrible static mixed in with the transmission from the <Yuunagi>, which had been clearly audible until then.

LABEL: 0x7BC9
STRING: In the blink of an eye, their voice became distorted beyond recognition.

LABEL: 0x7BFF
STRING: Yukari grabbed the microphone and spoke frantically.

LABEL: 0x7C9B
STRING: 「This is <SHEEP III>, there's noise――」

LABEL: 0x7D29
STRING: 「Hello?!」

LABEL: 0x7D47
STRING: 「<Yuunagi>! Can you hear me?! <Yuunagi>?!」

LABEL: 0x7D90
STRING: 「――Give me that!」

LABEL: 0x7DC6
STRING: I pushed Yukari away and stood in front of the control panel.

LABEL: 0x7E14
STRING: I ran my fingers over the touch panel, searching for the source of the noise.

LABEL: 0x7E54
STRING: 「It's strange that there's so much noise all of a sudden.」

LABEL: 0x7E8E
STRING: 「To put it bluntly, it's abnormal.」

LABEL: 0x7EB6
STRING: 「Something's going on... But what...?」

LABEL: 0x7EF0
STRING: My eyes followed each and every one of the rapidly opening windows.

LABEL: 0x7F3A
STRING: The cause of the error―I found it!

LABEL: 0x7F64
STRING: 「This is bad...」

LABEL: 0x7FEC
STRING: 「What did you find out?」

LABEL: 0x801B
STRING: 「――It's a buffer overflow.」

LABEL: 0x8047
STRING: 「There's a lot of data coming in...」

LABEL: 0x807D
STRING: 「The already narrow line is being clogged...」

LABEL: 0x8125
STRING: 「Who would do that, and from where?!」

LABEL: 0x8156
STRING: 「It's coming from――」

LABEL: 0x8174
STRING: 「This is... the library?!」

LABEL: 0x81A2
STRING: That was ridiculous.

LABEL: 0x81BE
STRING: Was there someone else on this ship?

LABEL: 0x82D3
STRING: 「! Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x82F8
STRING: 「Keep trying to maintain contact, Yukari-san!」

LABEL: 0x832C
STRING: I spat it out and dashed out of the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x837E
STRING: Where I was headed was already decided.

LABEL: 0x83AA
STRING: I rushed into the library and surveyed the room.

LABEL: 0x84A5
STRING: 「...No one's here?」

LABEL: 0x84E7
STRING: I heard the sound of approaching footsteps.

LABEL: 0x8511
STRING: Hiragino and Tokiwa came in right after me.

LABEL: 0x8618
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun! Are you okay!?」

LABEL: 0x8643
STRING: 「There's no one here... Someone was supposed to be here transmitting large amounts of data.」

LABEL: 0x86FF
STRING: 「What did you say?」

LABEL: 0x8720
STRING: But in reality, there was no one here.

LABEL: 0x874A
STRING: Saying it couldn't be true didn't change anything.

LABEL: 0x8790
STRING: What in the world was going on?

LABEL: 0x88AC
STRING: Only one display was powered up.

LABEL: 0x8918
STRING: Tokiwa stood in front of it and stared at it at close range.

LABEL: 0x89C8
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x89E2
STRING: 「I've noticed something.」

LABEL: 0x8A17
STRING: 「Tokiwa...?」

LABEL: 0x8A44
STRING: 「This might be a timer.」

LABEL: 0x8A74
STRING: 「When the timer is set off, it'll send a lot of data. That way, you don't have to be present yourself.」

LABEL: 0x8AD3
STRING: 「A timer...」

LABEL: 0x8B0B
STRING: Right!

LABEL: 0x8B21
STRING: I quickly looked at the clock.

LABEL: 0x8B47
STRING: It was a little past 12:00.

LABEL: 0x8B73
STRING: I see, the culprit had set the data transmission to start at exactly 12:00.

LABEL: 0x8BC5
STRING: So, that was why the noise started shortly after our transmission went through...

LABEL: 0x8C27
STRING: But that could only be done by someone who knew that the communications would be restored at exactly 12:00.

LABEL: 0x8C83
STRING: Which meant...

LABEL: 0x8D78
STRING: 「But, is there any proof, Tokiwa-kun?」

LABEL: 0x8DBF
STRING: 「I don't know if it'll prove anything, but there are traces of some bothersome manipulation here.」

LABEL: 0x8E6E
STRING: I was shocked.

LABEL: 0x8E8E
STRING: That PC was the only one up and running.

LABEL: 0x8EBA
STRING: It was the very PC that Reiri was using earlier.
